Name: Sacrifice
Effect: Destroy unit; gain 50% of Mana cost

Name: SKIP
Limitations: Increase duration of all existing modifiers by 4 turns

Name: Cone of Ice
Effect: Unit takes 45 - 60 damage and gains Sluggish 1 for 4 turns

Name: Cone of Electricity
Effect: Unit takes 45 - 60 damage and gains Weakened 5 for 4 turns

Name: Resolution
Effect: Heal units for 25 and Unit gains Tenacity 25 for 4 turns

Name: Refresh
Effect: Unit regains movement and attack for turn.

Name: Spacial Shift
Effect: Switch locations of commander and the chosen unit.
Limitations: Resulting locations must be legal for both units

Name: Cone of Light
Effect: Unit takes 60-90 damage and gains Blinded 2 for 4 turns

Name: Mana Shield
Effect: Unit gains Shielded 25 for 4 turns then heal unit 50% max health
